Sequence Information.Peptide Name: Myticin B (Myt B; natural AMPs; mollusca/molluscs/mollusks, marine invertebrates, animals; 4S=S)

Literature Information.Literature: Activity: Active against Gram+ M. luteus (MIC 1-2 uM), B. megaterium (MIC 1-2 uM), S-aureus  (MIC >20 uM), L-monocytogenes (MIC >20 uM), E. viridans (MIC 2-4 uM), Gram- E.coli D31 (MIC 120 -210 uM), S.newport (MIC 120 -210 uM), S-typhimurium (MIC >20 uM), B-suis (MIC >20 uM), P-aeruginosa (MIC >20 uM),  V-vulnificus (MIC >20 uM), V-splendidus (MIC >20 uM), fungi F. oxysporum (MIC 5-10 uM), and Protozoan P-marinus (MIC >20 uM). Updated 7/2021 GW
